heading: PS00009
0: Inclusion Of The Election Of Minority Leader In The Journal
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. PS00009
FULL TITLE :
SHORT TITLE : Inclusion Of The Election Of Minority Leader In The Journal
ABSTRACT : Rep. Lagman thanked the Majority Leader for granting his request, and added that he would read the contents of the letter if said request was not so granted so that it could be included in the Journal. REMARKS OF THE CHAIR The Chair stated that he was consistent with his ruling that he would not entertain any request to include said letter in the Journal unless the Majority Leader shall place the same by way of a motion. INSERTION INTO THE JOURNAL OF REP. LAGMAN’S LETTER TO THE SPEAKER Thereafter, on motion of Rep. Bondoc and there being no objection, the Body approved the insertion into the day’s Journal of Rep. Lagman’s letter to the Speaker regarding the issue of the Minority, to wit: . . . House Journal No.4, pp. 70-72)
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : LAGMAN, EDCEL C.
DATE FILED : 2016-08-01
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Speech-Others
